locations: gb, united kingdom, england, market harborough, , , , 52.4777114, -0.9208575
short_description: bakenology is a bakery based in market harborough, united kingdom.
long_description: bakenology blends supplies a growing range of functional blends and ingredients to bakeries and food manufacturers that aid processing, extend freshness and enhance quality aspects of baked goods. bakenology's operation has been brcgs accredited since 2020 and produces both gluten containing and gluten free blends under their ‘duro' brand. their current range includes:durobake - dough conditioners and functional blends formulated to improve both processing and baked quality attributes.durorise - raising agents that deliver crumb texture and baked volume.durofresh – powdered blends developed to enhance and extend crumb softness, flexibility and moistness over shelf life.durosoft - fat based ingredient blends that enhance crumb softness, richness and moistness.durofine – micro-fine single ingredients. with a low minimum order quantity and preference towards concentrated formulations, blends are packed in paper sacks, bag in box or fibc formats and distributed across the uk and northern eu.if you are seeking a functional blend that is specifically formulated for your process and product, then bakenology's knowledge of baking, flour milling and ingredients, their ability to formulate blends using enzymes, emulsifiers, acidulants and hydrocolloids, capability to blend small volumes and distribute throughout the uk and eu sets them apart from others. for more information about their ‘duro' product range or to discuss your own functional ingredient blend, bakenology promises an enthusiastic and proactive response.
business_tags: food production | single ingredients | beverage manufacturing | functional ingredients | flour & baking | powder blending | food manufacturing | gluten free | bags & sacks | functional blends | shelf life | baked goodness
generated_description: bakenology blends is a company that supplies bakeries and food manufacturers with a variety of functional blends and ingredients to improve the processing, freshness, and quality aspects of baked goods. they have been brcgs accredited since 2020 and offer gluten-containing and gluten-free blends under their 'duro' brand. their product range includes dough conditioners, raising agents, powdered blends, fat-based ingredient blends, and micro-fine single ingredients. bakenology's expertise in baking, flour milling, and ingredients allows them to formulate blends using enzymes, emulsifiers, acidulants, and hydrocolloids. they are known for their ability to blend small volumes and distribute throughout the uk and eu. with a low minimum order quantity and a preference for concentrated formulations, their blends are distributed in paper sacks, bag in box, or fibc formats and are distributed across the uk.
